title: koleusdat
author: koleusdat
content: There are a lot of survival shows now, like getting food for eating a worm or fighting your fear. We agreed with a friend that when we had the opportunity to try the beetle, we would do it, when we arrived in another country we couldn't even touch it, let alone eat. Do you think you could take part in a show about fears and survival? If so, what would be the scariest thing for you?

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I am a big fan of these types of tv shows. My favorite one of them is Survivor but there are so many others I watch.Life Below ZeroUltimate Survival AlaskaI Shouldn’t Be AliveMan vs. WildNaked and AfraidAlone

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: koleusdat on May 14, 2023, 04:42:20 PMThere are a lot of survival shows now, like getting food for eating a worm or fighting your fear. We agreed with a friend that when we had the opportunity to try the beetle, we would do it, when we arrived in another country we couldn't even touch it, let alone eat. Do you think you could take part in a show about fears and survival? If so, what would be the scariest thing for you?Is that a Reality Show? I do not really like the way this world run such shows. They tend to be so realistic that participants end up getting pregnant, harmed by animals in the jungle,  fight each other to the point of death, etc. It's possible that people you're interacting with in cyberspace or physical world are mere actors acting a show you aren't aware of. People who aren't part of the show get involved without their consent, or the actors/producers fail to let people know that a scene they got involved in is merely a show. For example, an argument scene will normally attract people in certain countries who will try to settle the argument without knowing it's merely a planned movie scene or something like that. Though movies tend to be more controlled unlike reality shows, and people are more aware that they are interacting with actors or watching a movie scene. Well, the interesting thing about such shows is that  it's pretty similar to how humans are existing in this world. It's like playing a role while being watched by angels, principalities and Powers... It's like a show within a show. The ones made by humans are watched by "big brother" and people.  People are allowed to live their real life in the shows while being watched. In regards to the part about fear and survival, for us there is absolutely nothing to fear. It's hard to be afraid when you know you are sorrounded by an Existence with invisible Beings that protect you and grant your good wishes/requests

comments.author: Wolyusi
comments.body: I think it depends on the craziness of a person, some can lick the toilet on a bet) try yourself in such a show is probably an interesting experience, thanks to which you can become famous.

comments.author: Giorg54
comments.body: Rather no than yes. It's scary to lose or break your head in a competition or eat a cockroach and get sick. The show is for strong people who are ready to step over themselves.
